wikipedia_page.main: Ben Murphy is a British pilot. He is a pilot of The Blades aerobatic team, and master class of the Red Bull Air Race World Championship. He is a former Commanding Officer of the Royal Air Force display team The Red Arrows

response: * Sqn Ldr Ben Murphy (RAF officer)(born 1975) RAF officer, Red Arrow and Red Bull Air Race Master Class.

response: * Ben Murphy (aviator) - Pilot of The Blades aerobatic team, and master class of the Red Bull Air Race World Championship.
Benjamin or Ben Murphy may refer to:
* Ben Murphy (Benjamin Edward Murphy, born 1942), American actor
* Ben Murphy (rugby union) (born 1996), Welsh rugby union player
* Ben Murphy (American football), American football coach

response: * Mélanie Astles, Kevin Coleman, Luke Czepiela and Ben Murphy will make their debuts in the Challenger Class. Astles will become the first female pilot to compete in a Red Bull Air Race event.
